title: Escaping Afghanistan: Matthieu Aikins chronicles the fall of Kabul & the long road for Afghan refugees
description: Matthieu Aikins, journalist and author of the new book, “The Naked Don't Fear the Water: An Underground Journey with Afghan Refugees,” talks to Chuck about what he saw during the fall of Kabul. In his new book, we tells the story of Omar, a friend and translator, who Aitkins accompanied in 2016 as he tried to escape to Europe, first through Turkey and then Greece.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
